metadata.name: Restored Collection
metadata.description:
Relics thought to be lost have been found, and are now in the basement! Restored Items Pack is a collection of Team Compliance's mods restoring items, pickups, and more from Antibirth to Repentance, featuring 23 items, a trinket, and 3 pickups!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/fu8tO7l.png[/img]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/KgZIMJX.png[/img]
[list] [*]23 collectibles to discover, ranging from items cut from Antibirth to items based on old design documents. [*]1 new squishy trinket! [*]3 new heart pickups, each with their own abilities! [*]Ancient variations of already existing items, which function how they did before being changed. [/list]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/4wDKe1V.png[/img]
[b][u]The following mods are included in some form within the Restored Collection, and should not be used in conjuntion with it:[/u][/b] [*]Antibirth Item Pack by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Team Compliance[/url] [*]The Lost Items Pack by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Team Compliance[/url] [*]Immortal Hearts by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Team Compliance[/url] [*]Sun Hearts by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Team Compliance[/url] [*]All individual item mods by [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982]Team Compliance[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SK84PpX.png[/img]
[*][u]𝐃𝐢𝐫𝐞𝐜𝐭𝐨𝐫[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198170829227]Gabriel[/url] [*][u]𝐂𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198858875349]Akad[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/fly_6]fly_6[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/im_tem]im_tem[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198330371330]Thicco Catto[/url], [*][u]𝐀𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐭𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199054232018]ALADAR[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/hoofuccingboyherewego]chug all this[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/Mattzilla1919]Firework[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url] [*][u]𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐬𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐨𝐫𝐬[/u] = [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/luciaprogamer]XxX_Lucia_2007_XxX[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561199116410592]chupeta[/url], YouDuckBoom [*][u]𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲𝐭𝐞𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐬[/u]= [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198858875349]Akad[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/brakedude]BrakeDude[/url],[url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198813796283]Kotry[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198374458982/]Sillst[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/funnynotename]The Demisemihemidemisemiquaver[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198330371330]Thicco Catto[/url], [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/We_Strvn]We Strvn[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/SlXbHql.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/xd2eafr.png[/img] [code][u]Public Entertainment Networked Interactive Software[/u] - For the original Antibirth mod as well as the content and concepts that this mod builds off of [u]WitchAmy[/u] - For contributions made whilst in the team [u]kittenchilly[/u] - For contributions made whilst in the team [u]PixelPlz[/u] - For contributions made whilst in the team [u]RatRatRat[/u] - For contributions made whilst in the team [/code]
